sentences.sContent: I used to stroll along the beach on Sundays.
sentences.sContent_eng: I used to stroll along the beach on Sundays.
sentences.sCn: 我过去常在星期天沿海滩散步。

sentences.sContent: ...A stroll through the campus store revealed the price difference...

remMethod.val: st ＋ roll(摇摆， 滚动) → 摇摇摆摆地去散步 → 散步

words.tran: 散步者；流浪者；（美）折叠式婴儿车；巡回演出的演员

trans.tranOther: to walk somewhere in a slow relaxed way
